name: ARAF (AMRSCDLMR)
description:
This is the project that I have developed for GDevelop Game Jam#3 named ARAF and it is the first game that I have ever devoloped. The theme for this jam was seperation and I have used the seperation of the soul from the body as my theme.

I hope you enjoy while playing my game!

Oh btw, you shall never forget that every death is a beginning :))

Assets:

Low Poly 2D Car Sprite Pack - Free 

Hooded Protagonist | Free Pixel Art Animated Character

1-Bit Platformer Pack
